title: Goldilocks and the Three Bears
sentence: SM EB     Goldilocks and the three bears  Once upon a time there was a forest and in the middle of that forest was a cottage and in the cottage lived three bears  a father bear  a mother bear and a baby bear  ~newline~ One morning Mother bear made porridge and served it up in three bowls but it was too hot to eat so the three bears went out for a walk while it cooled  ~newline~ Soon after this the three bears returned  ~newline~ Father bear looked down on his bowl  ~newline~ Mother bear looked down on her bowl  ~newline~ And then baby bear cried   And someone s been eating my porridge and at it s all gone   Father bear turned to his chair  ~newline~  And someone s been sitting in mine too   said Mother bear  ~newline~ Father bear noticed that his bed was all rumpled and crumpled  ~newline~ Mother bear noticed the same  ~newline~  There s someone in my bed sleeping right now   Goldilocks opened her eyes and screamed with terror at the sight of the three angry bears

title: Goldilocks and the Three Bears
sentence: And someone s been eating my porridge too   she said  ~newline~ And then baby bear cried   And someone s been eating my porridge and at it s all gone   Father bear turned to his chair  ~newline~  And someone s been sitting in mine too   said Mother bear  ~newline~  And someone s broken my chair   Baby Bear sobbed  ~newline~  And someone s been sleeping in my bed too   she said  ~newline~  There s someone in my bed sleeping right now   Goldilocks opened her eyes and screamed with terror at the sight of the three angry bears  ~newline~ Goldilocks never sneaked into someone else s house ever again

title: Goldilocks and the Three Bears
sentence: Perhaps I should lie down instead   She went into the bedroom  ~newline~ First she tried the big bed  but the head of the bed was too high and it sloped down too much  ~newline~ Then she tried the middle size bed but the foot of the bed was too high and it sloped up too much  ~newline~ Finally she tried the small bed and it was just right so she lay down and fell asleep  ~newline~  And someone s broken my chair   Baby Bear sobbed  ~newline~ They went into the bedroom  looking for the intruder  ~newline~ Father bear noticed that his bed was all rumpled and crumpled  ~newline~  Someone s been sleeping in my bed   he roared  ~newline~  And someone s been sleeping in my bed too   she said  ~newline~  There s someone in my bed sleeping right now   Goldilocks opened her eyes and screamed with terror at the sight of the three angry bears  ~newline~ She jumped out of bed then jumped out of the window and ran all the way home

title: Goldilocks and the Three Bears
sentence: First she tried the porridge in the big bowl   Mmm  too hot   Next she tried the middlesize bowl   Mmm  too cold   And then she tried the third bowl  the smallest and it was just right so she ate it all up  ~newline~ First she tried the big chair but it was too hard  ~newline~ Next she tried the middle size chair but it was too soft and then she tried the small chair but she was too heavy for it and it broke  ~newline~ First she tried the big bed  but the head of the bed was too high and it sloped down too much  ~newline~ Then she tried the middle size bed but the foot of the bed was too high and it sloped up too much  ~newline~ Finally she tried the small bed and it was just right so she lay down and fell asleep

title: Goldilocks and the Three Bears
sentence: One morning Mother bear made porridge and served it up in three bowls but it was too hot to eat so the three bears went out for a walk while it cooled  ~newline~ She was hungry and when she smelt the porridge she thought   That smells good   She looked through the window and saw the porridge on the table  ~newline~ First she tried the porridge in the big bowl   Mmm  too hot   Next she tried the middlesize bowl   Mmm  too cold   And then she tried the third bowl  the smallest and it was just right so she ate it all up  ~newline~  Someone s been eating my porridge   he growled  ~newline~  And someone s been eating my porridge too   she said  ~newline~ And then baby bear cried   And someone s been eating my porridge and at it s all gone   Father bear turned to his chair

title: Goldilocks and the Three Bears
sentence: First she tried the big chair but it was too hard  ~newline~ Next she tried the middle size chair but it was too soft and then she tried the small chair but she was too heavy for it and it broke  ~newline~ And then baby bear cried   And someone s been eating my porridge and at it s all gone   Father bear turned to his chair  ~newline~  Someone s been sitting in my chair   he growled ever louder  ~newline~  And someone s broken my chair   Baby Bear sobbed
